segments.text: Which kinds of meat are most popular in your country ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We eat a lot of chicken , pork and beef . You eat those meat a lot in your country too , don ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , we do . We also eat a lot of lamb .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: yes . I ’ Ve heard that people in your country like to eat lamb chops .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s right . They tastes so good ! We eat them with mint sauce . Have you every tried them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have . I tried them when I visited your country last year . I thought they were very tasty . Can you cook them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I certainly can . If I can get some from the butcher ’ s , I ’ ll cook them for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds great . I'll bring a bottle of wine .
segments.speaker: S2
